As a pastry chef at NoMI Kitchen, Chef Meg Galus is super-busy and prefers a one-stop-shop for her essentials and exquisites. Her idea of a great meal at home is bread paired with a fantastic cheese. She is also responsible for the famed NoMI cheese cave, and therefore a huge fan of Mariano’s cheese program.

Meg's restaurant

NoMI Kitchen
Chef Galus’s recipe

strawberry-rooibos tea soup

Meg's cheese selection

Chef Meg Galus loves all cheeses, but has a particular affection for a stinky cheese know as Epoisses. “You can leave it in the container and spoon it out like butter at room temperature. Delicious.”

Meg Galus' food tip

Put your freezer to good use

You can make many desserts ahead of time. Lots of pastry items, including batters & doughs, can be frozen for up to a few weeks.

gluten-free flour

Some gluten free flours are made from ground almonds or hazelnut, perfect for French macaroons.

Q & A

Which Mariano’s do you shop?

I shop at Mariano’s Roscoe Village because it’s closest to where I live.

How do you choose a cheese?

It depends on your audience. My cheese for home is different than the cheese I would choose for the restaurant because my husband’s palette is not as adventurous.

What are your three favorite cheeses from Mariano’s?

Kunik, Prairie Breeze Cheddar, and for stinky cheese, Epoisses or Langres. Oops, that’s four!

What’s your favorite cracker or bread pairing for cheese?

Baguette is classic, but by the cheese station they have water crackers. They’re thin and crispy without feeling like too much.

Where do you start if you’re new to pastries?

Always start with the best ingredients you possibly can. Organic, raw, unprocessed. If you’re going to do it, that’s the way to go.

Any other secrets of the baking aisle?

I always check the end of the aisle because I’m a nut for new equipment.

What do you look for in flour and sugar?

This year, I switched to all-organic flours and sugars in the restaurant. The flavor is better all around and it’s not overly processed.

What kind of beverage would go well with cheddar?

Cider is trending and I LOVE cider. Magners makes a great hard cider. Or go with a local beer like Goose Island.
